department.en: Department of Biomedical Sciences and Engineering

goal.ch: 本課程目的在於介紹數據科學，教導學生如何從資料收集、管理、統整分析至最終的圖表呈現。課程除了基礎統計分析說明之外，亦會介紹多種機器學習演算法，並且帶領學生使用 R 與 Python 分析生醫資料。
goal.en: This course provides a general introduction of the essential elements of data science, including data collection and management, summarizing and visualizing data, utilizing basic ideas of statistical inference, and machine learning. Students will have hand-on practices using Python and R.

outline.ch: 1.課程介紹2.用R language繪圖I3.用R language繪圖II4.數據科學介紹5.認識你的資料6.資料前處理7.頻繁資料探勘方法8.進階頻繁資料探勘方法9.期中考10.資料倉儲11.分類: 基本概念12.分類: 進階概念13.分群: 基本概念14.分群: 進階概念15.離群值分析16.線上分析前處理17.期末專題報告18.期末考
outline.en: 1.Course introduction2.plots I (R language)3.plots II (R language)4.Introduction of data science5.Getting to know your data6.Data preprocessing7.Frequent itemset mining methods8.Advanced pattern mining9.Midterm exam10.Data warehousing11.Classification: basic concept12.Advanced classification13.Cluster analysis: basic concept14.Cluster analysis: advanced15.Outliers and outlier analysis16.Online analytical processing17.Project presentation18.Final exam

textbook.ch: Data Mining : Concepts and Techniques, 3/e (Jiawei Han, Micheline Kamber, Jian Pei)Python 程式設計與數據分析 (白文章)Python 程式設計 AI與資料科學應用 (劉立民)
textbook.en: Data Mining : Concepts and Techniques, 3/e (Jiawei Han, Micheline Kamber, Jian Pei)Python 程式設計與數據分析 (白文章)Python 程式設計 AI與資料科學應用 (劉立民)

ch.competencies: 學習數物化、醫學、生物等科學基礎與精進知識、思辨邏輯及運用能力
執行實驗設計、數據分析與推論的能力
熟悉臨床醫學，並培養生醫器材或材料之設計、開發、及場域應用的能力
熟悉感測元件原理、訓練製造、設計與整合智慧系統
發掘、探究、解析、處理以及重構問題
培養多層面跨域整合與團隊合作
瞭解專業知識與人本倫理間的調和、以及技術對環境、社會之影響，並能持續學習

en.competencies: Learn the basics of mathematics, physics, chemistry, medicine, biology and their applications in healthcare
Ability to perform experimental design, data analysis and inference
Familiar with clinical medicine, and cultivate the ability of design, development, and field applications of biomedical devices or materials
Familiar with the principles of sensing elements, learn the ability to design, manufacture and integrate intelligent systems
The ability to discover, explore, analyze, process and reconstruct problems
Cultivate the ability of integrating multi-level cross-domain teamwork
Understand the reconciliation between professional knowledge and humanistic ethics, as well as the impact of technology on the environment and society, and the ability to continuous learning
